name: Casus Vita 1.0.1
description:
Have you ever been to trek? And really found it hard to fight the urge to just come back from there?

or have you ever lost yourself in an unknown place and counted it as one remarkable experience?
Well, this is something to transport you back to that world or to remind you of those little anecdotes, to bring back all of those to you.

It is an FPS game, for you to roam through terrain and have the feeling of it all.
